titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the allowance of capital losses of taxpayers other than corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/1/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the limit on the deductibility of losses from the sale or exchange of capital assets for individual taxpayers to $10,000, adjusted for inflation after 2009 ($5,000 for married individuals filing a separate tax return).
